format_specification.purpose: Token-optimized taxonomy for AI/ML coin classification

field_abbreviations.v: varieties (array of major variety names only)
field_abbreviations.n: notes (critical identifying info only, max 100 chars)
field_abbreviations.kw: identification_keywords (array of search terms and descriptors)
field_abbreviations.cn: common_names (array of popular names for this coin)

optimization_strategies: Compress variety info to names only
